name: Clear stored DESS context
info:
This allows for starting with a "fresh" cache of
the schedule. Shouldn't be needed, but you never
know when it might come in handy.

name: Maintenance of the stored context
Clear expired DESS context
info:
This allows for starting with a "fresh" cache of
the schedule. Shouldn't be needed, but you never
know when it might come in handy.

name: Process Dynamic ESS schedule
Be a bit friendly for the dbus
